org.ensor.algorithms.astar.grid

Class GridMapDiagonalMoves

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ensor.algorithms.astar.grid.GridMap
      • org.ensor.algorithms.astar.grid.GridMapDiagonalMoves
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMap<GridMover,GridNode>

    public class GridMapDiagonalMoves
extends GridMap
    This class represents a grid map on which a mover is allowed to move in the four cardinal compass directions as well as four diagonal directions. The adjacency returned by the getNeighbors method reflects this fact.
    Author:
    Jon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GridMapDiagonalMoves()
      This method's default constructor simply instantiates the base grid map class and inherits most of its functionality from there.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<GridNode> getNeighbors(GridMover mover, GridNode node)
      This method returns the neighbors of the given node for the given mover the four cardinal directions as well as the four diagonals.

        addNode, addNode, getCost, getHeight, getHeuristic, getNode, getWidth, isValid, removeNode

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getNeighbors

        public Collection<GridNode> getNeighbors(GridMover mover,
                                GridNode node)
        This method returns the neighbors of the given node for the given mover the four cardinal directions as well as the four diagonals.
        Specified by:
        getNeighbors in interface IMap<GridMover,GridNode>
        Specified by:
        getNeighbors in class GridMap
        Parameters:
        mover - The mover to find neighbors for in the map.
        node - The node from which to find neighboring nodes.
        Returns:
        A collection of neighboring nodes.
